type.name: org.gradle.nativeplatform.NativeComponentSpec
type.description: Definition of a software component that is to be built by Gradle to run a on JVM platform.

method.name: getBaseName
method.description: The name that is used to construct the output file names when building this component.

method.name: setBaseName
method.description: Sets the name that is used to construct the output file names when building this component.

property.name: baseName
property.description: The name that is used to construct the output file names when building this component.
